document.full_text: arizona's republican governor jan brewer said on monday she would immediately petition the u.s. supreme court to lift an injunction blocking key parts of the state's controversial crackdown on illegal immigrants.
document.title: arizona to petition supreme court on immigration
lines_and_colors: arizona's republican governor jan brewer said on monday she would immediately petition the u.s. supreme court to lift an injunction blocking key parts of the state's controversial crackdown on illegal immigrants.
